| HistoryText             = The '''Lords of Law''', including [[Arkyn (Earth-616)|Lord Arkyn]], were one of the parties in the war eternal waged on  [[Melniboné (World)|Melniboné]] between the forces of [[Law]] and [[Chaos]].<!-- {{r|Conan the Barbarian #14}} -->

During the [[Hyborian Age]], Arkyn and the Lords of Law were served by [[Zukala (Earth-616)|Zukala]], who enlisted the help of [[Conan (Earth-616)|Conan]], to oppose the plots of [[Kulan Gath (Impostor) (Earth-616)|Kulan-Gath]] (and secretly of those of [[Xiombarg (Earth-616)|Xiombarg, Queen of the Chaos Swords]].{{r|Conan the Barbarian #14}}<!-- 

...{{r|Conan the Barbarian #15}} -->
